general_advisory: As per the extended range forecast of IMD, MC, Bhubaneswar, dry weather along with normal to above normal minimum temperature is expected over the districts of Odisha. Farmers are advised to provide irrigation in crop fields and conduct spraying and intercultural operations. It is important to keep fields weed-free for proper crop growth. The prevailing temperature conditions may affect crop and animals, so precautions should be taken.
